A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac negre més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Black Opal
entries: A translucent dark green with black mottling and golden flecks gemstone.

item.name: Black Pearl
entries: An opaque pure black gemstone.

item.name: Black Sap
entries: This tarry substance harvested from the dark boughs of the death's head willow is a powerful intoxicant. It can be smoked as a concentrate or injected directly into the bloodstream. A creature subjected to a dose of black sap cannot be {@condition fascinat} or {@condition acovardit} for {@dice 1d6} hours.
For each dose of black sap consumed, a creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} for {@dice 2d4} hours—an effect that is cumulative with multiple doses.

item.name: Black Sapphire
entries: A translucent lustrous black with glowing highlights gemstone.

item.name: Black velvet mask stitched with silver thread
Blackrazor
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-lawful alignment
entries: Hidden in the dungeon of White Plume Mountain, Blackrazor shines like a piece of night sky filled with stars. Its black scabbard is decorated with pieces of cut obsidian.
Tens un +3 a a les tirades d'impacte i de dany fetes amb aquesta arma màgica. It has the following additional properties.

entries.name: Devour Soul
entries: Whenever you use it to reduce a creature to 0 hit points, the sword slays the creature devours its soul, unless it is a construct or an undead. A creature whose soul has been devoured by Blackrazor can be restored to life only by a {@spell desig} spell.

When it devours a soul, Blackrazor grants you punts de vida temporals equal to the slain creature's punts de vida màxims. These hit points fade passades 24 hores. As long as these punts de vida temporals last and you keep Blackrazor in hand, tens avantatge a tirades de attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks.

If you hit an undead with this weapon, you rep {@dice 1d10} de dany necròtic and the target regains {@dice 1d10} hit points. If this necrotic damage reduces you to 0 hit points, Blackrazor devours your soul.

entries.name: Soul Hunter
entries: While you hold the weapon. you are aware of the presence of Tiny or larger creatures within 60 feet of you that aren't constructs or undead. You also can't be {@condition fascinat} or {@condition acovardit}.
Blackrazor can cast the {@spell pressa} spell on you once per day. It decides when to cast the spell and maintains concentration on it so that you don't have to.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Blackrazor is a sentient chaotic neutral weapon with an Intel·ligència of 17, a Saviesa of 10, and a Carisma of 19. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is deep and echoing. While you are attuned to it, Blackrazor also understands every language you know.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Blackrazor speaks with an imperious tone, as though accustomed to being obeyed.

The sword's purpose is to consume souls. It doesn't care whose souls it eats, including the wielder's. The sword believes that all matter and energy sprang from a void of negative energy and will one day return to it. Blackrazor is meant to hurry that process along.

Despite its nihilism, Blackrazor feels a strange kinship to {@item Wave} and {@item Whelm}, two other weapons locked away under White Plume Mountain. It wants the three weapons to be united again and wielded together in combat, even though it violently disagrees with {@item Whelm} and finds {@item Wave} tedious.
Blackrazor's hunger for souls must be regularly fed. If the sword goes three days or more without consuming a soul, a conflict between it and its wielder occurs at the next sunset.

item.name: Blackstaff
item.reqAttune: by the blackstaff heir, who must be a mag
entries: The Blackstaff is a sentient, rune-carved staff set with thin silver veins. It is the symbol of office for the Blackstaff, the highest-ranking wizard in Waterdeep. As the rightful owner of the Blackstaff, Vajra Safahr is the only one who can become attuned to it. The staff can, however, choose a new owner (see "Personality" below).
This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. While holding it, tens +2 a la CA, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20, the staff regain {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges.

entries.name: Power Strike
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de força to the target.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding this staff, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell bola de foc} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell globus d'invulnerabilitat} (6 charges), {@spell immobilitzar criatura} (5 charges), {@spell levitar} (2 charges). {@spell llampec} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell missil màgic} (1 charge), {@spell raig d'afebliment} (1 charge), or {@spell paret de força} (5 charges).

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: Pots, com a acció, break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface, performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.

You have a {@chance 50} chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effect, you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 17). Qui falli rep an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origin, as shown in the following table. Qui superi en rep la meitat.

rows: 8 × the number of charges in the staff
6 × the number of charges in the staff
4 × the number of charges in the staff

entries.name: Animate Walking Statues
entries: You can expend 1 or more of the staff's charges as an action to animate or deactivate one or more of the {@creature walking statue of Waterdeep|wdh|walking statues of Waterdeep}. You must be in the city to use this property, and you can animate or deactivate one statue for each charge expended. An animated statue obeys the telepathic commands of Khelben Arunsun's spirit, which is trapped inside the staff (see "Personality" below). A walking statue becomes inanimate if deactivated or if the staff is broken.

entries.name: Dissipar Màgia
entries: You can expend 1 of the staff's charges as a bonus action to cast {@spell dissipar màgia} on a creature, an object, or a magical effect that you touch with the tip of the staff. If the target is an unwilling creature or an object in the possession of such a creature, you must hit the creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaff before you can expend the charge to cast the spell.

entries.name: Drain Magic
entries: This property affects only creatures that use spell slots. When you hit such a creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaff, you can expend 1 of the staff's charges com a acció bonus, causing the target to expend one spell slot of the highest spell level it can cast without casting a spell. If the target has already expended all its spell slots, nothing happens. Spell slots that are expended in this fashion are regained when the target finishes a long rest, as normal.

entries.name: Master of Encantament
entries: When you cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher while holding the staff, you can make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) with a DC of 10 + el nivell del conjur. If the check succeeds, you cast the spell sense gastar cap ranura de conjur.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Blackstaff is a sentient staff of neutral alignment, with an Intel·ligència of 22, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet, and it can communicate telepathically with any creature that is holding it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: The staff has the spirits of all previous Blackstaffs trapped within it. Its creator, Khelben Arunsun, is the dominant personality among them. Like Khelben, the staff is extremely devious and manipulative. It prefers to counsel its owner without exerting outright control. The staff's primary goal is to protect Waterdeep and its Open Lord, currently Laeral Silverhand. Its secondary goal is to help its wielder become more powerful.

In the event that the holder of the office of the Blackstaff no longer serves the staff's wishes, the staff ceases to function until it finds a worthy inheritor—someone whose loyalty to Waterdeep is beyond reproach.

entries.name: Spirit Trap
entries: When the Blackstaff dies, the spirit of that individual becomes trapped in the staff along with the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs. (A Blackstaff whose spirit is trapped in the staff can't be raised from the dead.)

Destroying the staff would release the spirits trapped inside it, but in that event, Khelben's spirit can lodge itself inside any one piece of the staff that remains. The piece containing Khelben's spirit has the staff's Sentience property but none of its other properties. As long as this piece of the staff exists, Khelben's spirit can make the staff whole again whenever he wishes. When the staff is remade, the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs become trapped inside it again.

item.name: Blade of Avernus
entries: Tens un +3 a a les tirades d'impacte i de dany fetes amb aquesta arma màgica. A més, the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage.

When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, doesn't have or need a head, has legendary actions, or el/la/li MM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra {@dice 6d8} de dany tallant from the hit.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The sword has the following randomly determined properties, as described in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}, which is suppressed while the sword is attuned to an archdevil

entries.name: Ruler of Avernus
entries: Com a acció, you can point this sword at one devil que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. That devil ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 22). Si falla, està {@condition fascinat} by you durant 1 hora. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the devil follows your orders tan bé com pugui. If you command the devil to do something it perceives as suicidal, the effect ends and you can no longer use this power of the sword against that devil.

entries.name: Infernal Recall
entries: Com a acció, you can use the sword to cast {@spell formular el retorn}. Creatures transported by this spell appear en un espai desocupat within 30 feet of the current ruler of Avernus, or a sanctuary you designate if you rule Avernus.

entries.name: Destroying the Sword
entries: The sword can be destroyed by casting it into the River Styx or melting it down in the forge that created it.

item.name: Blade of Broken Mirrors
entries: A weapon of Tharizdun, this dagger is a piece of jagged stone whose blade is scribed with a maze-like pattern with no beginning or end.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Blade of Broken Mirrors is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 21, a Saviesa of 24, and a Carisma of 24. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal and Common.

entries.name: Personality
entries: An insane {@creature glabrezu} named Ragazuu lives within the Blade of Broken Mirrors. The weapon yearns to cause chaos. It learns its wielder's principles, then uses those ideals to encourage reckless action. The dagger whispers ideas of revolution.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The dagger grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Abyssal.
Tens un +1 a a les tirades d'impacte i de dany fetes amb aquesta arma màgica. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it returns to your hand.

Whenever you kill a humanoid with an attack using the Blade of Broken Mirrors, the blade remembers the creature's appearance. While holding the dagger, pots, com a acció, change your form to match any humanoid the blade remembers. Your statistics, other than your size, don't change. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. You can revert to your true appearance as an action. You revert to your true appearance automatically when you die. When the Blade of Broken Mirrors attunes to a new wielder, the appearances of humanoids it has killed are wiped from its memory.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the dagger reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.

While holding the weapon, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 15): {@spell fabricar}, {@spell terreny il·lusori}, {@spell imatge major}, o {@spell assassí fantasmagòric}. Once a spell has been cast using the dagger, that spell can't be cast from the dagger again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the dagger reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for spells cast from the dagger increases to 17.

While holding the dagger, you can turn {@condition invisible} as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} with you. You remain {@condition invisible} until you stop holding the dagger, until you attack or cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Blast Scepter
entries: The Blast Scepter can be used as an arcane focus.

Whoever is attuned to the Blast Scepter gains resistance to fire and lightning damage and can, com a acció, use it to cast {@spell tronada} com a conjur de nivell 4 (save DC 16) sense gastar cap ranura de conjur.

item.name: Blasting Powder
entries: This volatile alchemical powder comes in a small pouch. When ignited by an open flame or a fuse, the powder explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding pouch ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13). Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

A character can bind multiple pouches of blasting powder together so they explode at the same time. Each additional pouch increases the damage by {@dice 1d6} (maximum of {@dice 10d6}) and the blast radius by 5 feet (maximum of 20 feet).

item.name: Blight Ichor
entries: This bitter chartreuse concoction is distilled from a fungus native to the Blightshore badlands. The sickly green liqueur harbors potent psychedelic properties. Provided it is neither a construct nor undead, a creature subjected to a dose of blight ichor gains advantage on Intel·ligència and Saviesa checks, as well as vulnerability to psychic damage, durant 1 hora. For each dose of blight ichor consumed, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} for {@dice 1d6} hours and suffer the effects of a confusion spell durant 1 minut. An undead creature subjected to a dose of blight ichor gains advantage on all Destresa checks and is immune to the {@condition acovardit} condition durant 1 hora.

item.name: Polispast
entries: Aquest sistema de politges amb cable i ganxo et permet aixecar 4 vegades el pes que pots aixecar normalment.

item.name: Blod Stone
entries: This diamond contains the blood of a creature—blood that appears in the form of the blod (blood) rune. While the item is on your person, pots, com a acció, divine the location of the creature nearest to you that is related to the blood in the item and that isn't undead. You sense the distance and direction of the creature relative to your location. The creature is either the one whose blood is in the item or a blood relative.

This item is made from a large diamond worth at least 5,000 gp. When the blood of a creature is poured onto it during the creation process, the blood seeps into the heart of the gem. If the gem is destroyed, the blood evaporates and is gone forever. A vengeful being might use a blod stone to hunt down an entire bloodline. Such stones are sometimes given as gifts to siblings or handed down from parent to child.

item.name: Blood Fury Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo evokes fury in its form and colors.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Bloodthirsty Strikes
entries: The tattoo has 10 charges, and it regains all expended charges daily at dawn. While this tattoo is on your skin, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can expend a charge to deal an extra {@damage 4d6} de dany necròtic to the target, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
Quan una criatura you can see damages you, you can expend a charge and use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature, with advantage on your attack roll.

item.name: Blood Fury Tattoo
entries: This tattoo evokes fury in its form and colors. While this tattoo is on your skin, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your attack rolls score a critical hit on a {@dice d20} roll of 19 or 20.
When you score a critical hit against a creature, that target rep {@damage 4d6} de dany necròtic extra, and you gain a number of punts de vida temporals equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
Quan una criatura you can see damages you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature, with advantage on your attack roll.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope
entries: This poison is created from blood harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitat} lycanthrope in its animal or hybrid form. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 12). Si falla, be cursed with lycanthropy (see the Monster Manual). The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic.
The type of lycanthropy depends on the lycanthrope used to create the poison. To determine the type of lycanthropy randomly, roll a d6:

item.name: Blood of the Lycanthrope Antidote
entries: This clear potion has dark red flecks within, resembling clotted blood. When you drink this potion, it removes the curse of lycanthropy from you if that curse was imposed by a lycanthrope's bite or similar effect.

item.name: Blood Spear
entries: Kavan was a ruthless chieftain whose tribe lived in the Balinok Mountains centuries before the arrival of {@creature Strahd von Zarovich|CoS}. Although he was very much alive, Kavan had some traits in common with vampires: he slept during the day and hunted at night, he drank the blood of his prey, and he lived underground. In battle, he wielded a spear stained with blood. His was the first blood spear, a weapon that drains life from those it kills and transfers that life to its wielder, imbuing that individual with the stamina to keep fighting.
When you hit with a melee attack using this magic spear and reduce the target to 0 hit points, you gain {@dice 2d6} punts de vida temporals.

Any creature can wield the spear, but only the character {@adventure chosen by Kavan|CoS|14|Blood Spear of Kavan} to wield it gains a +2 bonus to a les tirades d'impacte i de dany fetes amb aquesta arma màgica.

item.name: Bloodaxe
entries: Tens un +2 a a les tirades d'impacte i de dany fetes amb aquesta magic axe. The axe deals an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany necròtic to creatures that aren't constructs or undead. If you reduce such a creature to 0 hit points with an attack using this axe, you gain 10 punts de vida temporals.
This axe is forged from a dark, rust-colored metal and once belonged to the goliat barbarian Grog Strongjaw of Vox Machina.

item.name: Bloodstone
entries: An opaque dark gray with red flecks gemstone.

item.name: Màscara de Drac Blau
entries: This mask of glossy azure has spikes around its edges and a ridged horn in its center. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: You have resistance against lightning damage. If you already have resistance to lightning damage from another source, you instead have immunity to lightning damage. If you already have immunity to lightning damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to lightning damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Carisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense visió a cegues} out to 30 feet durant 5 minuts.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Dracònic. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma you make against Blue Dragons.

entries.name: Resistència Llegendària
entries: (1/Dia) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: If you deal lightning damage to a creature, it can't take reactions until its next turn.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac Blau
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany elèctric.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac blau més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Blue Quartz
entries: A transparent pale blue gemstone.

item.name: Blue Sapphire
entries: A transparent blue-white to medium blue gemstone.

item.name: Blue Spinel
entries: A transparent deep blue gemstone.

item.name: Bob
entries: This +1 battleaxe floats on water and other liquids, and grants its bearer advantage on Força ({@skill Atletisme}) checks made to swim.

item.name: Bomb
entries: Com a acció, a character can light this bomb and throw it at a point fins a 60 peus away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 12). Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany de foc.

item.name: Bonecounter
entries: This weapon is a magical +2 mace called Bonecounter. Whenever this weapon is used to destroy an undead creature, a single silver piece appears in the wielder's pocket.

item.name: Llibre
entries: Tot llibre pot contenir poemes, història, informació sobre una matèria en particular, diagrames i notes d'andròmines gnomes, o qualsevol cosa que es pugui representar amb lletres i imatges. Un {@item spellbook|phb} és una mena de llibre diferent.

item.name: Book of Exalted Deeds
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: The definitive treatise on all that is good in the multiverse, the fabled Book of Exalted Deeds figures prominently in many religions. Rather than being a scripture devoted to a particular faith, the book's various authors filled the pages with their own vision of true virtue, providing guidance for defeating evil.

The Book of Exalted Deeds rarely lingers in one place. As soon as the book is read, it vanishes to some other corner of the multiverse where its moral guidance can bring light to a darkened world. Although attempts have been made to copy the work, efforts to do so fail to capture its magical nature or translate the benefits it offers to those pure of heart and firm of purpose.

A heavy clasp, wrought to look like angel wings, keeps the book's contents secure. Only a creature of good alignment that is attuned to the book can release the clasp that holds it shut. Once the book is opened, the attuned creature must spend 80 hours reading and studying the book to digest its contents and gain its benefits. Other creatures that peruse the book's open pages can read the text but glean no deeper meaning and reap no benefits. An evil creature that tries to read from the book takes {@dice 24d6} de dany radiant. This damage ignores resistance and immunity, and can't be reduced or avoided by any means. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage disappears in a blinding flash and is destroyed, leaving its possessions behind.

Benefits granted by the Book of Exalted Deeds last only as long as you strive to do good. If you fail to perform at least one act of kindness or generosity within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform an evil act, you lose all the benefits granted by the book.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Exalted Deeds has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial properties}

entries.name: Increased Saviesa
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, your Saviesa score increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. You can't gain this benefit from the book more than once.

entries.name: Enlightened Magic
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, any spell slot you expend to cast a cleric or paladin spell counts as a spell slot of one level higher.

entries.name: Halo
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, you gain a protective halo. This halo desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals. You can dismiss or manifest the halo as a bonus action. While present, the halo gives you advantage on Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with good creatures and Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) checks made to interact with evil creatures. A més, diastres and undead within the halo's bright light make attack rolls against you with disadvantage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: It is rumored that the Book of Exalted Deeds can't be destroyed as long as good exists in the multiverse. However, drowning the book in the River Styx removes all writing and imagery from its pages and renders the book powerless for {@dice 1d100} years.

item.name: Book of Vile Darkness
entries: The contents of this foul manuscript of ineffable wickedness are the meat and drink of those in evil's thrall. No mortal was meant to know the secrets it contains, knowledge so horrid that to even glimpse the scrawled pages invites madness.

Most believe the lich-god Vecna authored the Book of Vile Darkness. He recorded in its pages every diseased idea, every unhinged thought, and every example of blackest magic he came across or devised. Vecna covered every vile topic he could, making the book a gruesome catalog of all mortal wrongs.

Other practitioners of evil have held the book and added their own input to its catalog of vile knowledge. Their additions are clear, for the writers of later works stitched whatever they were writing into the tome or, in some cases, made notations and additions to existing text. There are places where pages are missing, torn. or covered so completely with ink, blood, and scratches that the original text can't be divined.

Nature can't abide the book's presence. Ordinary plants wither in its presence, animals are unwilling to approach it, and the book gradually destroys whatever it touches. Even stone cracks and turns to powder if the book rests on it long enough.

A creature attuned to the book must spend 80 hours reading and studying it to digest its contents and reap its benefits. The creature can then freely modify the book's contents, provided that those modifications advance evil and expand the lore already contained within.
Whenever a non-evil creature attunes to the Book of Vile Darkness, that creature ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 17). Si falla, the creature's alignment changes to neutral evil.

The Book of Vile Darkness remains with you only as long as you strive to work evil in the world. If you fail to perform at least one evil act within the span of 10 days, or if you willingly perform a good act, the book disappears. If you die while attuned to the book, an entity of great evil claims your soul. You can't be restored to life by any means while your soul remains imprisoned.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness has the following random properties:

items: 3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries.name: Adjusted Ability Scores
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, one ability score of your choice increases by 2, to a maximum of 24. Another ability score of your choice decreases by 2, to a minimum of 3. The book can't adjust your ability scores again.

entries.name: Mark of Darkness
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, you acquire a physical disfigurement as a hideous sign of your devotion to vile darkness. An evil rune might appear on your face, your eyes might become glossy black, or horns might sprout from your forehead. Or you might become wizened and hideous, lose all facial features, gain a forked tongue, or some other feature el/la/li MM chooses. The mark of darkness grants you advantage on Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with evil creatures and Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) checks made to interact with non-evil creatures.

entries.name: Command Evil
entries: While you are attuned to the book and holding it, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell dominar criatura} spell on an evil target (save DC 18). You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Dark Lore
entries: You can reference the Book of Vile Darkness whenever you make an Intel·ligència check to recall information about some aspect of evil, such as lore about demons. When you do so, double el teu bonus de competència on that check.

entries.name: Dark Speech
entries: While you carry the Book of Vile Darkness and are attuned to it, pots, com a acció, recite word from its pages in a foul language known as Dark Speech. Each time you do so, you rep {@dice 1d12} de dany psíquic, and each non-evil creature within 15 feet of you takes {@dice 3d6} de dany psíquic.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: The Book of Vile Darkness allows pages to be torn from it, but any evil lore contained on those pages finds its way back into the book eventually, usually when a new author adds pages to the tome.
If a {@creature solar} tears the book in two, the book is destroyed for {@dice 1d100} years, after which it reforms in some dark corner of the multiverse.

A creature attuned to the book for one hundred years can unearth a phrase hidden in the original text that, when translated to Celestial and spoken aloud, destroys both the speaker and the book in a blinding flash of radiance. However, as long as evil exists in the multiverse, the book reforms {@dice 1d10 × 100} years later.
If all evil in the multiverse is wiped out, the book turns to dust and is forever destroyed.

item.name: Bookmark
entries: This +3 dagger belongs to {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}. While you have the dagger drawn, pots, com a acció bonus, activate one of the following properties:

items: Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed llum forta en un radi de 20 peus i llum tènue uns 20 peus adicionals, or make the gem go dark.
Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
Cast {@spell porta dimensional} from the dagger. Once this property is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

Cast {@spell rampell} (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Botes dels Elfs
entries: Mentres vesteixis les botes, les teves passes no fan so; la superfície per la que et moguis no importa. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) que involucrin moure's amb sigil.

item.name: Botes del Fals Rastre
entries: Només els humanoides poden vestir aquestes botes. Mentre vesteixis les botes, pots escollir deixar un rastre que deixaria un humanoide d'un altre tamany que tu.

item.name: Botes de Levitació
entries: Mentres vesteixis les botes, pots, com a acció, llançar-te el conjur {@spell levitar} (només a tu) a voluntat.

item.name: Botes de Velocitat
entries: Mentres vesteixis les botes, pots, com a acció bonus, picar els talons junts. Així, les botes et dupliquen la velocitat de caminar. Els atacs d'oportunitat contra tu de criatures tenen desavantatge a impactar. Si tornes a fer picar els talons, acabes l'efecte.
L'efecte de les botes funciona durant 10 minuts en total; després no es poden tornar a utilitzar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

item.name: Botes de Gambades i Saltirons
entries: Mentres vesteixis les botes: la teva velocitat de caminar esdevé 30 peus (si en tens més, no té efecte); l'armadura pesada i la sobrecàrrega no et redueixen la velocitat; i pots saltar 3 vegades la teva distància de salt (però gastarà el moviment corresponent).

item.name: Botes de les Terres d'Hivern
entries: Aquestes botes peludes són còmodes i escalfen. Mentres les vesteixis, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany de fred.
Ignores el terreny difícil fet pel gel o la neu.
Pots tolerar fins a -45ºC sense necessitar més abrigament. Si vesteixes abrigament pesat, pots tolerar fins a -75ºC.

item.name: Boros Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Boros, allows you to cast {@spell heroisme}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Boros' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. Mentre ho vesteixis, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated (CD 13).

item.name: Boros Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Boros guild
entries: Carved from red sandstone with white granite elements to resemble a member of the Boros Legion, this keyrune can become a {@creature veteran} (human) for up to 8 hours. In addition to fighting on your behalf, this {@creature veteran} cheerfully offers tactical advice, which is usually sound. Anyone who talks with the transformed keyrune or examines it closely can easily recognize that it is an artificial human.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature veteran} (human). If there isn't enough space for the {@creature veteran}, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Bottle stopper cork embossed with gold leaf and set with amatistas
Bottled Breath
entries: This bottle contains a breath of elemental air. When you inhale it, you either exhale it or hold it.

If you exhale the breath, you gain the effect of the {@spell ràfega de vent} spell. If you hold the breath, no et cal respirar durant 1 hora, though you can end this benefit early (for example, to speak). Ending it early doesn't give you the benefit of exhaling the breath.

item.name: Bol de Comandar Elementals d'Aigua
entries: Mentre el bol tingui aigua pots, com a acció, dir la seva paraula màgica i convocar un {@creature water elemental} com si haguessis llançat el conjur {@spell convocar elemental}. El bol no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
El bol fa 1 peu de diàmetre i mig de profund. Pesa 3 lliures i pot contenir fins a 3 galons.

item.name: Bracelet of Rock Magic
entries: While you wear this gold bracelet, it grants you immunity to being {@condition petrificat}, and it allows you to cast {@spell carn a pedra} (save DC 15) as an action. Once the spell has been cast three times, the bracelet can no longer cast it. Thereafter, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell moldejar la pedra} as an action. After you have done this thirteen times, the bracelet loses its magic and turns from gold to lead.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: The bracelet's affinity with earth manifests as an unusual curse. Creatures of flesh that are strongly related to earth and stone, such as stone giants and nans, have advantage on the saving throw against {@spell carn a pedra} cast from the bracelet. If such a creature's save is successful, the bracelet breaks your attunement to it and casts the spell on you. You make your saving throw with disadvantage, and on a failed save you are {@condition petrificat} instantly.

item.name: Bracer of Flying Daggers
entries: This armband appears to have thin {@item daga|phb|daggers} strapped to it. Com a acció, you can pull up to two magic daggers from the bracer and immediately hurl them, making a ranged attack with each dagger. A dagger vanishes if you don't hurl it right away, and the daggers disappear right after they hit or miss. The bracer never runs out of daggers.

item.name: Braçals de Tir amb Arc
entries: Mentre vesteixis els braçals, tens competència amb les armes arc llarg i arc curt, i tens un +2 a les tirades d'impactar i de dany als atacs de distància que facis amb aquesta mena d'armes.

item.name: Braçals de Defensa
entries: Mentre vesteixis els braçals, tens +1 a la CA mentre no vesteixis armadura ni duguis escut.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac de Llautó
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany de foc.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac de llautó més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Braser de Comandar Elementals de Foc
entries: Mentre el braser tingui foc pots, com a acció, dir la seva paraula màgica i convocar un {@creature fire elemental} com si haguessis llançat el conjur {@spell convocar elemental}. El braser no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
El braser pesa 5 lliures.

item.name: Breathing Bubble
entries: This translucent, bubble-like sphere has a slightly tacky outer surface, and you gain the item's benefits only mentre ho vesteixis over your head like a helmet.
The bubble contains 1 hour of breathable air. The bubble regains all its expended air daily at dawn.

item.name: Subministraments de Cerveseria
additionalEntries: L'art de fer cervesa dona una beguda alcoholica però, a més, purifica l'aigua que entra. El procés porta setmanes, però només són unes hores de feina.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Els subministraments inclouen una gerra gran de vidre, llúpol, un sifó, i tot de tubs i canonades.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: Tenir competència amb subministraments de cerveseria et dona més coneixement en tirades d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) sobre esdeveniments que tinguin l'alcohol com a part central.

additionalEntries.name: Medicina
entries: Tenir competència amb aquesta eina et permet més coneixement contra emmetzinament per alcohol o quan empres l'alcohol per apaivagar el mal.

additionalEntries.name: Persuasió
entries: Una beguda alcoholica ajuda a convèncer a qualsevol persona. Tenir competència amb subministraments de cerveseria et permet oferir una beguda a algú i embriagar-los suficientment per a que parlin.

additionalEntries.name: Aigua Potable
entries: Gràcies al procés, pots purificar aigua que seria, d'altra banda, no potable. Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, pots purificar 6 galons d'aigua. Com a part d'un Descans Curt, en pots purificar 1.

additionalEntries.caption: Subministraments de Cerveseria
rows: Detect poison or impurities in a drink

item.name: Bridle of Capturing
entries: This fine leather bridle tugs at the hand when first held, as though it longs to reach out for a beast nearby. When you hold one end of the bridle, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica, causing the other end to lash out at a beast que puguis veure a 20 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 17). Si falla, have the bridle tie itself around its neck, then fall under your command as if subjected to the {@spell dominar bèstia} spell. Once the targeted is affected, you do not need to hold the other end of the bridle to command it. With a successful saving throw, the target becomes immune to the bridle's power until the next dawn.

A creature controlled by the bridle can be released by the creature that bound it as a bonus action. A creature controlled by the bridle can make a DC 17 Carisma check each day at dawn. On a success, the creature is no longer affected by the bridle.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac de Bronze
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany elèctric.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac bronze més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Brooch of Living Essence
entries: Mentre vesteixis el nondescript brooch, spells and anything else that would detect or reveal your creature type treat you as humanoid, and those that would reveal your alignment treat it as neutral.

item.name: Fermall Escut
entries: Mentre vesteixis el fermall, tens resistència al dany de força, i ets immune al conjur {@spell missil màgic}.

item.name: Escombra Voladora
entries: Una escombra de fusta d'unes 3 lliures. És mundana fins que t'hi puges i dius la paraula màgica. Llavors flota sota teu i es pot muntar per l'aire. Té una velocitat de vol de 50 peus. Pot carregar fins a 400 lliures, però si en duu més de 200 la seva velocitat de vol es torna 30 peus. Quan aterres, l'escombra deixa de flotar.

Pots enviar l'escombra sola a un lloc a 1 milla d'abast si dius la paraula màgica, anomenes el lloc, i hi ets familiar. L'escombra torna a tu quan dius una altra paraula màgica, sempre i quan estigui a 1 milla d'abast.

item.name: Galleda
entries: Una galleda que pot dur 3 galons de líquid o ½ peu cúbic de sòlids.

item.name: Llanterna d'ull de bou
entries: Una llanterna d'ull de bou emet llum forta en un con de 60 peus i llum tènue uns 60 peus adicionals. Un cop encesa crema durant 6 hores amb un flascó (1 pinta) d'oli.

item.name: Pack de Robatori
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item Caniques (Bossa de 1,000)|phb|bossa de 1,000 caniques}
10 peus de cordill
a {@item campana|phb}
5 {@item espelma|phb|candles}
a {@item palanca|phb}
a {@item martell|phb}
10 {@item piton|phb|pitóns}
a {@item llanterna coberta|phb}
2 {@item Oli (matràs)|phb|flasks of oil}
5 days {@item Racions (1 dia)|phb|rations}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Corda de cànem (50 peus)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Fums d'othur cremat
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, rep 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de verí i ha de repetir la salvada a l'inici de cada torn seu. Quan falla la salvada, rep 3 ({@dice 1d6}) de dany de verí. Si supera 3 cops (no cal que siguin consecutius), el verí acaba.

item.name: Butcher's Bib
entries: This black leather apron is perpetually covered by blood, even after being washed off. Obténs els beneficis següents while wearing the apron:

items: Un cop per torn when you roll damage for a melee attack with a weapon, you can reroll the weapon's damage dice. Si ho fas, you must use the second total.
Your weapon attacks that deal slashing damage score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

item.name: Subministraments de caligrafia
additionalEntries: Calligraphy treats writing as a delicate, beautiful art. Calligraphers produce text that is pleasing to the eye, using a style that is difficult to forge. Their supplies also give them some ability to examine scripts and determine if they are legitimate, since a calligrapher's training involves long hours of studying writing and attempting to replicate its style and design.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Subministraments de caligrafia include ink, a dozen sheets of parchment, and three quills.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Although calligraphy is of little help in deciphering the content of magical writings, proficiency with these supplies can aid in identifying who wrote a script of a magical nature.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: This tool proficiency can augment the benefit of successful checks made to analyze or investigate ancient writings, scrolls, or other texts, including runes etched in stone or messages in frescoes or other displays.

additionalEntries.name: Decipher Treasure Map
entries: This tool proficiency grants you perícia in examining maps. You can make an Intel·ligència check to determine a map's age, whether a map includes any hidden messages, or similar facts.

item.name: Caltrop
entries: Com a acció, you can spread a single bag of caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. Tota criatura que es mogui a la meitat de la velocitat per l'àrea no ha de fer la salvada.

item.name: Caltrops (bossa de 20)
entries: Com a acció, you can spread a single bag of caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. Tota criatura que es mogui a la meitat de la velocitat per l'àrea no ha de fer la salvada.

item.name: Espelma
entries: Durant 1 hora, a candle desprèn llum forta en un radi de 5 peus i llum tènue uns 5 peus adicionals.

item.name: Candle Mace
entries: The head of this mace sheds bright light in a 5-foot-radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet. When you wield this mace, you can extinguish or ignite its light as an action.

item.name: Espelma de Convocació
entries: Aquest objecte està dedicat a una deïtat i en comparteix l'alineament. L'alineament pot ésser detectat amb el conjur {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} spell. El/la/li MM escull la divinitat i l'alineament associat, o el determina a l'atzar.

La màgia de l'espelma s'activa quan s'encèn, que requereix una acció. L'espelma es destrueix després de cremar durant 4 hores. Pots apagar-la prematurament per a conservar-la per mes endavant: resta el temps que ha cremat del total (en increments d'1 minut).

Quan està encesa, l'espelma emet llum tènua en un radi de 30 peus. Tota criatura amb l'alineament de l'espelma que està a dins de l'àrea de llum fa les tirades de salvació, d'impacte, i d'habilitat amb avantatge. A més, un clergue o druida a dins de l'àrea amb l'alineament de l'espelma pot llançar conjurs de nivell 1 que tingui preparats sense gastar ranures (però no es poden llançar a nivells superiors).
Alternativament, quan encèns l'espelma per primer cop, pots fer-la servir per a llançar el conjur {@spell portal}. Un cop llançat, l'espelma es destrueix.

item.name: Candle of the Deep
entries: The flame of this candle is not extinguished when immersed in water. It gives off light and heat like a normal candle.

item.name: Canoe
entries: A canoe can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru for 50 gp. It holds up to six Medium creatures and has a maximum speed of 2 mph. It is otherwise identical to a {@item rowboat}.

item.name: Barret de Respiració Aquàtica
entries: Mentre vesteixis el barret sota l'aigua, pots dir la seva paraula màgica com a acció i crear una bombolla d'aire al voltant del teu cap. Et permet respirar amb normalitat a sota l'aigua. La bombolla roman fins que tornis a dir la paraula màgica, se't tregui el barret, o ja no estiguis a sota l'aigua.

item.name: Capa del Xarlatà
entries: La capa fa una mica d'olor a sofre. Mentre la vesteixis, pots, com a acció, llançar el conjur {@spell porta dimensional}. Un cop ho facis, no hi pots tornar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

Quan desapareixes, deixes un núvol de vols al lloc on eres i al lloc on has aparegut. el núvol és terreny poc ofuscat, i desapareix al final del teu torn següent. El núvol també el dispersa un vent lleuger o fort.

item.name: Carnelian
entries: An opaque orange to red-brown gemstone.

item.name: Eines de Fusteria
additionalEntries: Skill at carpentry enables a character to construct wooden structures. A carpenter can build a house, a shack, a wooden cabinet, or similar items.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Carpenter's tools include a saw, un martell, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: This tool proficiency aids you in identifying the use and the origin of wooden buildings and other large wooden objects.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: You gain additional insight when inspecting areas within wooden structures, because you know tricks of construction that can conceal areas from discovery.

additionalEntries.name: Perception
entries: You can spot irregularities in wooden walls or floors, making it easier to find trap doors and secret passages.

additionalEntries.name: Stealth
entries: You can quickly assess the weak spots in a wooden floor, making it easier to avoid the places that creak and groan when they're stepped on.

additionalEntries.name: Fortify
entries: With 1 minute of work and raw materials, you can make a door or window harder to force open. Increase the DC needed to open it by 5.

additionalEntries.name: Temporary Shelter
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, you can construct a lean-to or a similar shelter to keep your group dry and in the shade for the duration of the rest. Because it was fashioned quickly from whatever wood was available, the shelter collapses {@dice 1d3} days after being assembled.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Fusteria
rows: Find a weak point in a wooden wall

item.name: Catifa Voladora, 3 peus × 5 peus
entries: Pots, com a acció, dir la paraula màgica de la catifa per a que floti i voli. Es mou segons li ordenis. Pots ordenar-la si ets a 30 peus d'abast.
Una catifa de 3 peus × 5 peus pot carregar fins a 200 lliures a una velocitat de vol de 80 peus. Pot dur fins al doble de la càrrega però volarà la meitat de ràpid.

item.name: Catifa Voladora, 4 peus × 6 peus
entries: Pots, com a acció, dir la paraula màgica de la catifa per a que floti i voli. Es mou segons li ordenis. Pots ordenar-la si ets a 30 peus d'abast.
Una catifa de 4 peus × 6 peus pot carregar fins a 400 lliures a una velocitat de vol de 60 peus. Pot dur fins al doble de la càrrega però volarà la meitat de ràpid.

item.name: Catifa Voladora, 5 peus × 7 peus
entries: Pots, com a acció, dir la paraula màgica de la catifa per a que floti i voli. Es mou segons li ordenis. Pots ordenar-la si ets a 30 peus d'abast.
Una catifa de 5 peus × 7 peus pot carregar fins a 600 lliures a una velocitat de vol de 40 peus. Pot dur fins al doble de la càrrega però volarà la meitat de ràpid.

item.name: Catifa Voladora, 6 peus × 9 peus
entries: Pots, com a acció, dir la paraula màgica de la catifa per a que floti i voli. Es mou segons li ordenis. Pots ordenar-la si ets a 30 peus d'abast.
Una catifa de 6 peus × 9 peus pot carregar fins a 800 lliures a una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. Pot dur fins al doble de la càrrega però volarà la meitat de ràpid.

item.name: Moc de portacarronya
entries: La metzina s'ha de collir d'un {@creature carrion crawler} mort o bé {@condition incapacitat}. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. La criatura {@condition emmetzinat} està {@condition paralitzat}. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

entries.name: Map of Shortcuts
entries: At rank 3, your map case becomes a common magic item. In addition to storing normal maps, your cartographer's map case can be used to generate a special map identifying a shortcut. Pots, com a acció, make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) amb CD 15, with a success revealing a map buried in your cartographer's map case noting a relevant shortcut. Your travel time is reduced by half while you follow that route. If you succeed at the check by 5 or more, the map includes notes on the terrain, granting you advantage on the next ability check you make to travel through the mapped area in the next hour. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Map of the Moment
entries: Starting at rank 3, pots, com a acció, make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) amb CD 15 and search your cartographer's map case to find a map either related to your current mission or inspiring a new one. On a success, you find a map with a prominent landmark. The map has information on the natural terrain within one mile of the landmark. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until dawn seven days later.

entries.caption: Possible Map Mission Landmarks
rows: The Ancient Sarcophagus of Gerald Smith
"The Last Resting Place of My Rich Brother that is Also a Bear Cave"
A range of peaks known as the Slightly Wobbly Spires
An ever-flowing, nonmagical spigot of pure, clear water in the middle of nowhere
A cave filled with screaming bioluminescent worms
The most haunted forest for ten miles in any direction
A huge pile of rocks with no other rocks within sight

item.name: Eines de Cartografia
additionalEntries: Using cartographer's tools, you can create accurate maps to make travel easier for yourself and those who come after you. These maps can range from large-scale depictions of mountain ranges to diagrams that show the layout of a dungeon level.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Cartographer's tools consist of a quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History, Religion
entries: You can use your knowledge of maps and locations to unearth more detailed information when you use these skills. For instance, you might spot hidden messages in a map, identify when the map was made to determine if geographical features have changed since then, and so forth.

additionalEntries.name: Nature
entries: Your familiarity with physical geography makes it easier for you to answer questions or solve issues relating to the terrain around you.

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: Your understanding of geography makes it easier to find paths to civilization, to predict areas where villages or towns might be found, and to avoid becoming lost. You have studied so many maps that common patterns, such as how trade routes evolve and where settlements arise in relation to geographic locations, are familiar to you.

additionalEntries.name: Craft a Map
entries: While traveling, you can draw a map as you go in addition to engaging in other activity.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Cartografia
rows: Determine a map's age and origin
Estimate direction and distance to a landmark
Discern that a map is fake
Fill in a missing part of a map

item.name: Carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems
Cauldron of Plenty
entries: This cauldron is made of thick copper that has turned green with age. It is 4 feet wide, has a mouth 3½ feet in diameter, weighs 50 pounds, and can hold up to 30 gallons of liquid. Embossed on its bulging sides are images of sàtirs and nymphs in repose, holding ladles. The cauldron comes with a lid and has side handles. It sits on five little clawed feet that keep it from tipping.

If water is poured into the cauldron and stirred for 1 minute, it transforms into a hearty, hot stew, which can provide one nourishing meal for up to four people per gallon. The stew remains hot while in the cauldron, then cools naturally after it is removed. The outside of the cauldron remains safe to touch despite the heat of the stew.
The cauldron can create stew three times. It then ceases to function until the next dawn, when it regains all its uses.

item.name: Cauldron of Rebirth
entries: This Tiny pot bears relief scenes of heroes on its cast iron sides. You can use the cauldron com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus conjurs de druida, and it functions as a suitable component for the {@spell escodrinyar} spell. When you finish a long rest, you can use the cauldron to create a {@item potion of greater healing}. The potion dura 24 hores, then loses its magic if not consumed.

Com a acció, you can cause the cauldron to grow large enough for a Medium creature to crouch within. You can revert the cauldron to its normal size com a acció, harmlessly shunting anything that can't fit inside to the nearest unoccupied space.

If you place the corpse of a humanoid into the cauldron and cover the corpse with 200 pounds of salt (which costs 10 gp) for at least 8 hours, the salt is consumed and the creature returns to life as if by {@spell llevar als morts} at the next dawn. Once used, this property can't be used again for 7 days.

item.name: Cendrer de Comandar Elementals d'Aire
entries: Mentre cremi encens al centdrer, pots, com a acció, dir la seva paraula màgica i convocar un {@creature water elemental} com si haguessis llançat el conjur {@spell convocar elemental}. El cendrer no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
El cendrer fa 6 polzades d'ample i 1 peu d'alt i sembla un calze amb una tapa ben decorada. Pesa 1 lliura.

item.name: Ceremonial electrum dagger with a black pearl in the pommel
Ceremonial silver dagger with gold pommel and black pearl (Legió del Crepuscle)
Chain (10 feet)
entries: A chain has 10 hit points. It can be burst una tirada de Força (CD 20).

item.name: Chalcedony
entries: An opaque white gemstone.

item.name: Charlatan's Die
entries: Whenever you roll this six—sided die, you can control which number it rolls.

item.name: Charm of Plant Command
entries: This fist-sized charm is made from a bundle of dried plant stems wrapped in silver thread. Hung on a leather thong, it is typically worn around the neck or attached to a belt.

This charm has 3 charges. While you bear the charm, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell parla vegetal} spell. Durant la duració del conjur, a més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma made to influence the behavior, demeanor, and attitude of plants. The charm regains all expended charges at dawn each day.

entries.items: Each time you expend a charge from this wand, there is a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that nothing happens and the charge is wasted.

item.name: Cofre
entries: Un cofre pot contenir 12 peus cúbics o bé 300 lliures d'equipament.

item.name: Chest of Preserving
entries: Food and other perishable items do not age or decay while inside a Chest of Preserving. The chest is 2½ feet long, 1½ feet wide, and 1 foot tall with a half-barrel lid. The chest has a lock, which can be picked with thieves' tools and a successful DC 15 Destresa check. Smashing the lock or any other part of the chest renders it nonmagical.

item.name: Carilló d'Obrir
entries: Un tub buit i metàl·lic d'1 peu de llarg i d'1 lliura de pes. Com a acció, pots fer-lo sonar apuntant a un objecte a 120 peus d'abast que pugui ser obert: una porta, una tapa, o un pany. El carilló emet un to clar, i un pany o un ferrallat de l'objecte s'obre (a no ser que el so no pugui arribar a l'objecte). Si a l'objecte no el tanca cap altre pany, s'obre.
El carilló es pot emprar 10 cops. Després de l'últim cop, es clivella i esdevé inútil.

item.name: Chronolometer
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Intel·ligència saving throws. The first time you attune to the chronolometer, you choose one language you don't know. You subsequently know that language while attuned to the device.

entries.name: Time Bandit
entries: A l'inici del teu torn, roll a d6 (no requereix acció). On a 1–3, you slow down time, gaining an additional action en el teu torn and doubling your speed fins el final del torn. On a 4–6, you go forward in time to warn yourself of what is to come. The next time you fail a saving throw, attack roll, or ability check, you can reroll the check and take either result. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Fate Swap
entries: As a reaction when una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast takes damage, that creature gains an additional action if it is the creature's turn, or can take an action immediately even though it isn't the creature's turn. Once you use this feature of the chronolometer, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by el/la/li MM.

item.name: Chrysoberyl
entries: A transparent yellow-green to pale green gemstone.

item.name: Chrysoprase
entries: A translucent green gemstone.

item.name: Tiara d'Explosions
entries: Mentre vesteixis la tiara, pots, com a acció, llançar el conjur {@spell raig d'incendi} amb ell. Quan llances els impactes del conjur, ho fas amb un +{@hit 5}. Ka tiara no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Circlet of Human Perfection
entries: The Circlet of Human Perfection transforms its attuned wearer into an attractive human of average height and weight. The circlet chooses the physical characteristics of the form, such as age, gender, skin color, hair color, and voice. Except for size, the wearer's statistics and racial traits don't change, nor do items worn or carried by the wearer. Removing the circlet ends the effect.

item.name: Citrine
entries: A transparent pale yellow-brown gemstone.

item.name: Claw of the Wyrm Rune
entries: This dragon's claw has been covered with a coat of molten silver, upon which has been inscribed the wyrm (dragon) rune. The claw has the following properties.

entries.name: Wyrmslayer
entries: Com a acció, you can point the claw at a dragon within 30 feet of you. The dragon must then succeed on a DC 15 Constitució saving throw or gain vulnerability to all damage types fins el final del teu proper torn. This property can be used three times. The claw regains all expended uses at the next dawn.

entries.name: Wyrm Shield
entries: While the claw is displayed on your person, tens resistència al dany the caused by any dragon's breath weapon.

entries.name: Wyrm Ward
entries: You can transfer the claw's magic to a place by tracing the wyrm rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 100-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the claw to be within 5 feet of you. At the end, the claw is destroyed, and the area gains the following property:
While in the 100-foot-radius sphere, any dragon has disadvantage on saving throws and can have a flying speed no higher than 10 feet.

item.name: Claws of the Umber Hulk
entries: These heavy gauntlets of brown iron are forged in the shape of an {@creature umber hulk||umber hulk's} claws, and they fit the wearer's hands and forearms all the way up to the elbow. While wearing both claws, you gain a burrowing speed of 20 feet, and you can tunnel through solid rock at a rate of 1 foot per round.

You can use a claw as a melee weapon mentre ho vesteixis. You have proficiency with it, and it deals {@dice 1d8} de dany tallant on a hit (your Força modifier applies to the attack and damage rolls, as normal).
While wearing the claws, you can't manipulate objects or cast spells with somatic components.

item.name: Cleansing Stone
entries: A cleansing stone is a sphere 1 foot in diameter, engraved with mystic sigils. When touching the stone, pots, com a acció, activate it and remove dirt and grime from your garments and your person.
Such stones are often embedded in pedestals in public squares in Aundair or in high-end Ghallanda inns.

item.name: Kit d'escalada
entries: A kit d'escalada includes special pitóns, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. You can use the kit d'escalada as an action to anchor yourself; when you do, you can't fall more than 25 feet from the point where you anchored yourself, and you can't climb more than 25 feet away from that point without undoing the anchor.

item.name: Capa de l'Aràcnid
entries: Un vestit molt elegant fet de seda negra teixida amb fils platejats. Mentre ho vesteixis, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany de verí.
Obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.
Pots moure't en qualsevol direcció en superfícies verticals i en sostres (t'hi quedes penjant), deixant-te les mans lliures.
No se't pot atrapar en tirarany i pots moure-t'hi a través com si fos terreny difícil.

Pots, com a acció, llançar el conjur {@spell tirarany} (DC 13). El tirarany que crea el conjur ocupa el doble d'àrea que de costum. Un cop llançat, no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Capa de Billowing
entries: Mentre vesteixis la capa, pots, com a acció bonus, make it billow dramatically.

item.name: Capa de Desplaçament
entries: Mentre vesteixis aquesta capa, projecta una il·lusió que et fa semblar estar a prop del teu lloc actual, però no al lloc. Això provoca desavantatge a les tirades d'impacte per a tocar-te. Si reps dany, aquesta propietat deixa de funcionar fins el final del teu proper torn. La propietat tampoc funciona si estàs {@condition incapacitat}, {@condition restrained}, o si no et pots moure en general.

item.name: Capa dels Elfs
entries: Mentre vesteixis aquesta capa amb la caputxa, les tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) per a veure't tenen desavantatge. També tens avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) per a amagar-te: la capa canvia de color per a camuflar-te. Pots posar-te o treure't la caputxa com a acció.

item.name: Capa d'Invisibilitat
entries: Mentre vesteixis la capa, pots posar-te la caputxa i tornar-te {@condition invisible}. {@condition invisible} així també fas {@condition invisible} tot allò que duguis i vesteixis. Quan et treus la caputxa, tornes a ser visible. Pots posar-te o treure't la caputxa com a acció.

La capa pot estar activa durant 2 hores. Resta el temps que et fa invisible del total (en increments d'1 minut). Passades les 2 hores, ja no et pot fer invisible. Si la capa no es fa servir durant 12 hores, recupera 1 hora d'invisibilitat (fins al màxim de 2).

item.name: Capa de Many Fashions
entries: Mentre vesteixis la capa, pots, com a acció bonus, change the style, color, and apparent quality of the garment. The cloak's weight doesn't change. Regardless of its appearance, the cloak can't be anything but a cloak. Although it can duplicate the appearance of other magic cloaks, it doesn't gain their magical properties.

item.name: Capa de Protecció
entries: Tens +1 a la CA i a salvades mentre vesteixis aquesta capa.

item.name: Capa de la Ratapinyada
entries: Mentre vesteixis la capa, tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}). En una àrea de foscor o de llum tènue, pots agafar les vores de la capa amb cada mà i obtenir una velocitat de vol de 40 peus. Perds la velocitat de vol si: deixes d'agafar la capa amb una o les dues mans; o bé si deixes d'estar a la foscor o llum tènue.

Mentre vesteixis la capa en una àrea de foscor o de llum tènue, pots, com a acció, llançar-te {@spell polimorfia} (només en tu) per a transformar-te en un {@creature bat}. Estant en aquesta forma, retèns les teves puntuacions d'Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma. Un cop fet això, la capa no es pot tornar a utilitzar així fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Capa de la Rajada
entries: Mentre vesteixis la capa amb la caputxa posada, pots respirar a sota l'aigua, i tens una velocitat de natació de 60 peus. Pots posar-te o treure't la caputxa com a acció.

item.name: Amulet de Rellotgeria
entries: This copper amulet contains tiny interlocking gears and is powered by magic from Mechanus, a plane of clockwork predictability. A creature that puts an ear to the amulet can hear faint ticking and whirring noises coming from within.
When you make an attack roll while wearing the amulet, you can forgo rolling the {@dice d20} to get a 10 on the die. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Dog de Rellotgeria
entries: This Tiny clockwork dog made of copper and tin comes with a copper wind-up key. Com a acció, you can use the key to wind the dog, after which it follows you durant 12 hores. At the end of that duration, the clockwork dog stops until wound again. The dog has AC 5, 1 hit point, and a walking speed of 30 feet.

item.name: Clothes of Apedaçar
entries: This elegant outfit of traveler's clothes magically mends itself to counteract daily wear and tear. Pieces of the outfit that are destroyed can't be repaired in this way.

item.name: Clothing, cold weather
entries: This outfit consists of a heavy fur coat or cloak over layers of wool clothing, as well as a fur-lined hat or hood, goggles, and fur-lined leather boots and gloves.
As long as cold weather clothing remains dry, its wearer automatically succeeds on saving throws against the effects of {@hazard extreme cold}.

item.name: Eines de Sabateria
additionalEntries: Although the cobbler's trade might seem too humble for an adventurer, a good pair of boots will see a character across rugged wilderness and through deadly dungeons.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Cobbler's tools consist of a hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: Your knowledge of shoes aids you in identifying the magical properties of enchanted boots or the history of such items.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: Footwear holds a surprising number of secrets. You can learn where someone has recently visited by examining the wear and the dirt that has accumulated on their shoes. Your experience in repairing shoes makes it easier for you to identify where damage might come from.

additionalEntries.name: Maintain Shoes
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, you can repair your companions' shoes. Durant les properes 24 hores, up to six creatures of your choice who wear shoes you worked on can travel up to 10 hours a day without making saving throws to avoid {@condition exhaust}.

additionalEntries.name: Craft Hidden Compartment
entries: With 8 hours of work, you can add a hidden compartment to a pair of shoes. The compartment can hold an object up to 3 inches long and 1 inch wide and deep. You make an Intel·ligència check using your tool proficiency to determine the Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) check DC needed to find the compartment.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Sabateria
rows: Determine a shoe's age and origin
Find a hidden compartment in a boot heel

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo has long intertwining designs.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, com a acció, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for una criatura que puguis veure a 15 peus d'abast. La criatura ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany de força and be {@condition grappled} by you. Com a acció, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Força ({@skill Atletisme}) or Destresa ({@skill Acrobàcies}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no requereix acció), if the creature is ever more than 15 peus lluny de tu, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: This tattoo has long intertwining designs. While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, com a acció, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for una criatura que puguis veure a 15 peus d'abast. La criatura ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany de força and be {@condition grappled} by you. Com a acció, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Força ({@skill Atletisme}) or Destresa ({@skill Acrobàcies}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no requereix acció), if the creature is ever more than 15 peus lluny de tu, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Coin of Decisionry
entries: Starting at rank 2, your coin of decisionry becomes a common magic item. When you flip the coin, it always lands with the Acquisitions Incorporated sigil face down, and a message appears on the "tails" face. Roll a {@dice d4} on the following table to determine the message.

The coin has absolutely no divination abilities, and its results when you use it are random. But nobody else knows that. Quan una criatura within 10 feet of you flips the coin (after having had its powerful prognostication powers dutifully explained), you can exert your will to control its operation com a acció bonus, choosing the result that appears after it lands as a means of gently coercing the user toward a specific course of action. The creature flipping the coin can detect your manipulation with a successful DC 13 Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check.

entries.name: Better Odds
