entries: When you reach rank 3, your coin of decisionry gains a measure of actual divination power and becomes an uncommon magic item. In addition to its normal function, pots, com a acció, flip the coin of decisionry twice while pondering a specific plan or objective, noting both random results. If you succeed on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 15, you learn which of the two results is more applicable to the course of action. This property of the coin no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Coin of Delving
entries: This scintillating copper coin sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. If dropped a distance greater than 5 feet, the coin issues a melodious ringing sound when it hits a surface. Any creature that can hear the chime can determine the distance the coin dropped based on the tone.

item.name: Cold Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Common Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave is clothing imbued with harmless illusory magic. While wearing the common version of these clothes, pots, com a acció bonus, create a moving illusory pattern within the cloth.

item.name: Bossa de Components
entries: Una bossa de components is a small, watertight leather belt pouch that has compartments to hold all the material components and other special items you need to cast your spells, except for those components that have a specific cost (as indicated in a spell's description).

item.name: Concertina
entries: A concertina is a less charming kind of accordion.
In addition to knocking out a killer polka, a creature playing the concertina can use an action to cause an area of mist or water fins a 30 peus in diameter and 6 inches deep to freeze solid.
Once used, this feature of the concertina no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

Any creatures touching the floor ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 20). Si falla, be restrained by the ice. Com a acció, a {@condition restrained} creature can attempt to free itself or another creature within its reach from the ice, doing so with a successful DC 20 Força ({@skill Atletisme}) check. A character freed from the ice is no longer restrained by it. The ice melts in an hour.

item.name: Conch of Safe Rest
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this pearlescent conch like a horn, creating an effect identical with that of a {@spell Barraca Diminuta d'en Leomund} spell. The conch disappears once the spell takes effect. The effect ends if you leave the spell's area.

item.name: Conch of Teleportation
entries: This item is an ordinary, albeit rather large, conch shell that has been inscribed with the uvar rune. The conch measures 2½ feet long and weighs 20 pounds.

Com a acció, you can cast the {@spell teleportació} spell by blowing into the shell. The destination is fixed, and there is no chance of either a mishap or the spell being off target. Anyone teleported by the conch appears in a specific location designated by the item's creator at the time the uvar rune is inscribed on the conch. It doesn't allow teleportation to any other destination. Once its spell is cast, the conch no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Utensilis de Cuina
additionalEntries: Adventuring is a hard life. With a cook along on the journey, your meals will be much better than the typical mix of hardtack and dried fruit.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Utensilis de Cuina include a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: Your knowledge of cooking techniques allows you to assess the social patterns involved in a culture's eating habits.

additionalEntries.name: Medicina
entries: When administering treatment, you can transform medicine that is bitter or sour into a pleasing concoction.

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: When foraging for food, you can make do with ingredients you scavenge that others would be unable to transform into nourishing meals.

additionalEntries.name: Prepare Meals
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt, you can prepare a tasty meal that helps your companions regain their strength. You and up to five creatures of your choice regain 1 extra hit point per Dau de Vida spent during a short rest, provided you have access to your utensilis de cuina and sufficient food.

additionalEntries.caption: Utensilis de Cuina
rows: Spot poison or impurities in food
